48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah [may Allah be pleased with him] narrated that :the Prophet said: “No group gather in a sitting in which they do not remember Allah, nor sent Salat upon their Prophet, except it will be a source of remorse for them. If He wills, He will punish them, and if He wills, He will forgive them.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْقَوْمِ يَجْلِسُونَ وَلاَ يَذْكُرُونَ اللَّهَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Group That Sits And They Do Not Remember Allah
